scripts.setupci: npm run downloadssg && npm run installssg && npm run installtheme
scripts.installssg: tar -xvf hugo_0.14_linux_amd64.tar.gz && cd hugo_0.14_linux_amd64 && ln -s ./hugo_0.14_linux_amd64 hugo
scripts.installtheme: mkdir -p ./src/themes && cd ./src/themes && git clone https://github.com/bguiz/hugo-theme-casper.git --branch bguiz-cumulative --single-branch casper
scripts.generatedocs: npm run build && export PATH=${PWD}/hugo_0.14_linux_amd64:${PATH} && cd ./src && hugo version && hugo
scripts.servedocs: npm run watch && export PATH=${PWD}/hugo_0.14_linux_amd64:${PATH} && cd ./src && hugo version && hugo server -w
